commit.message: WIP refactor storing of auth data
WIP splited authorization config and authentication config
allowes to register extra resources to the admin end for authentication purposes
makes local realm use the XodusStore Class
adds endpoint for local realm functionality to add, update, and remove
adds cors filters to unprotected resource
adds an login for the admin end
makes request filter generation based on class instead of object
makes admin port and app port have different resources registered on their /auth endpoint
moves random token generation to realm initialization
